event.description: Alex Gordon pops out to catcher Jonathan Lucroy in foul territory.
Mike Moustakas strikes out swinging.
Lorenzo Cain grounds out sharply, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Ryan Rua.
Eric Hosmer grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Ryan Rua.
Salvador Perez lines out sharply to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Brandon Moss pops out to third baseman Joey Gallo.
Paulo Orlando flies out sharply to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Alcides Escobar singles on a line drive to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Raul Mondesi grounds out softly, pitcher Allen Webster to first baseman Ryan Rua. Alcides Escobar to 2nd.
Alex Gordon grounds out softly, third baseman Joey Gallo to first baseman Ryan Rua.
Defensive Substitution: Cesar Puello replaces center fielder Delino DeShields, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Jared Hoying replaces right fielder Shin-Soo Choo, batting 2nd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Marte replaces second baseman Rougned Odor, batting 4th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Jurickson Profar replaces left fielder Nomar Mazara, batting 6th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Drew Robinson replaces first baseman Ryan Rua, batting 7th, playing first base.
Mike Moustakas grounds out sharply, first baseman Drew Robinson to pitcher Allen Webster.
Lorenzo Cain walks.
Eric Hosmer grounds into a double play, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Drew Robinson. Lorenzo Cain out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Jason Martinson replaces third baseman Joey Gallo, batting 8th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Michael De Leon replaces shortstop Elvis Andrus, batting 9th, playing shortstop.
Pitching Change: Anthony Bass replaces Allen Webster.
Drew Butera homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
Brandon Moss strikes out swinging.
Paulo Orlando singles on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Michael De Leon.

Royals challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Alcides Escobar grounds into a double play, shortstop Michael De Leon to second baseman Luis Marte to first baseman Drew Robinson. Paulo Orlando out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Robinson Chirinos replaces catcher Jonathan Lucroy, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Raul Mondesi strikes out swinging.
Logan Moon grounds out, shortstop Michael De Leon to first baseman Drew Robinson.
Cheslor Cuthbert grounds out, pitcher Anthony Bass to first baseman Drew Robinson.
Pitching Change: Preston Claiborne replaces Anthony Bass.
Billy Burns flies out to left fielder Jurickson Profar.
Brayan Pena singles on a line drive to second baseman Luis Marte, deflected by shortstop Michael De Leon.
Drew Butera flies out to right fielder Jared Hoying.
Brandon Moss grounds out, second baseman Luis Marte to first baseman Drew Robinson.
Travis Snider remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitching Change: Austin Bibens-Dirkx replaces Preston Claiborne.
Peter O'Brien strikes out swinging.
Christian Colon strikes out swinging.
Whit Merrifield grounds out, second baseman Luis Marte to first baseman Drew Robinson.
Pitching Change: Brady Dragmire replaces Austin Bibens-Dirkx.
Logan Moon walks.
Cheslor Cuthbert grounds into a force out, third baseman Jason Martinson to second baseman Luis Marte. Logan Moon out at 2nd. Cheslor Cuthbert to 1st.
Billy Burns walks. Cheslor Cuthbert to 2nd.
Brayan Pena doubles (4) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Cesar Puello. Cheslor Cuthbert scores. Billy Burns scores.
Zane Evans grounds out, first baseman Drew Robinson to pitcher Brady Dragmire. Brayan Pena to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Humberto Arteaga replaces Brandon Moss.
Humberto Arteaga grounds out, pitcher Brady Dragmire to first baseman Drew Robinson.
Delino DeShields singles on a fly ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Shin-Soo Choo lines out sharply to left fielder Alex Gordon.
With Carlos Gomez batting, Delino DeShields steals (14) 2nd base, . Delino DeShields advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Salvador Perez.
Carlos Gomez out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Delino DeShields scores.
Rougned Odor hit by pitch.
Jonathan Lucroy grounds out, third baseman Mike Moustakas to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Nomar Mazara lines out sharply to second baseman Raul Mondesi.
Ryan Rua doubles (3) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Joey Gallo hit by pitch.
Elvis Andrus walks. Ryan Rua to 3rd. Joey Gallo to 2nd.
Delino DeShields out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Alex Gordon. Ryan Rua scores.
Shin-Soo Choo doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder Alex Gordon. Joey Gallo scores. Elvis Andrus scores.
Carlos Gomez doubles (4) on a fly ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Shin-Soo Choo scores.
Rougned Odor pops out to shortstop Alcides Escobar.
Pitching Change: Peter Moylan replaces Jason Hammel.
Jonathan Lucroy called out on strikes.
Nomar Mazara lines out sharply to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Ryan Rua flies out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Defensive Substitution: Drew Butera replaces catcher Salvador Perez, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Jason Vargas replaces Peter Moylan.
Joey Gallo grounds out, shortstop Alcides Escobar to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Elvis Andrus pops out to first baseman Eric Hosmer in foul territory.
Cesar Puello singles on a line drive to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Jared Hoying called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Logan Moon replaces left fielder Alex Gordon, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Cheslor Cuthbert replaces third baseman Mike Moustakas, batting 2nd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Billy Burns replaces center fielder Lorenzo Cain, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Brayan Pena replaces first baseman Eric Hosmer, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Peter O'Brien replaces right fielder Paulo Orlando, batting 7th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Christian Colon replaces shortstop Alcides Escobar, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Carlos Gomez strikes out swinging.
Luis Marte strikes out swinging.
Jonathan Lucroy flies out to left fielder Logan Moon.
Defensive Substitution: Whit Merrifield replaces second baseman Raul Mondesi, batting 9th, playing second base.
Jurickson Profar singles on a line drive to left fielder Logan Moon.
Drew Robinson flies out to left fielder Logan Moon.
Jason Martinson strikes out swinging.
With Michael De Leon batting, Jurickson Profar caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Drew Butera to second baseman Whit Merrifield.
Pitching Change: Al Alburquerque replaces Jason Vargas.
Michael De Leon grounds out, pitcher Al Alburquerque to first baseman Brayan Pena.
Cesar Puello singles on a ground ball to right fielder Peter O'Brien.
Jared Hoying strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Travis Snider replaces Carlos Gomez.
Travis Snider called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Zane Evans replaces catcher Drew Butera, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Tim Hill replaces Al Alburquerque.
Luis Marte strikes out on a foul tip.
Robinson Chirinos flies out to left fielder Logan Moon.
Jurickson Profar grounds out, third baseman Cheslor Cuthbert to first baseman Brayan Pena.
